mapper.select: SELECT p.*, h.user_funding_date, h.user_funding_amout, h.user_funding_pct, sh.total_sum_pct FROM farm_and_product p JOIN funding_history h ON(p.product_serial_num=h.product_serial_num) JOIN (SELECT hh.product_serial_num,SUM(hh.user_funding_pct) AS total_sum_pct FROM funding_history hh GROUP BY hh.product_serial_num) sh ON (p.product_serial_num=sh.product_serial_num) WHERE h.user_serial_num=#{user_serial_num}
SELECT * FROM cultivating_product_detail c WHERE c.product_serial_num=#{product_serial_num} ORDER BY c.update_date desc

SELECT QUERY1.product_serial_num, QUERY1.auction_thumb_img_url, QUERY1.product_name, QUERY1.farm_name, QUERY1.farm_address, QUERY1.auction_deadline, QUERY1.product_status, QUERY2.max_user_price, QUERY1.d_day, QUERY1.auction_status FROM (SELECT b.product_serial_num, user_serial_num, auction_thumb_img_url, product_name, farm_name, farm_address, auction_deadline, b.product_status, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), CONCAT(c.auction_deadline, ' 00:00:00')) as d_day, a.auction_status FROM auction_history a INNER JOIN farm_and_product b ON a.product_serial_num = b.product_serial_num INNER JOIN auction_reg_info c ON a.product_serial_num = c.product_serial_num WHERE a.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num}) AS QUERY1 join (SELECT product_serial_num, MAX(user_price) max_user_price FROM auction_history WHERE product_serial_num IN (SELECT product_serial_num FROM auction_history WHERE user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} ) GROUP BY product_serial_num) as QUERY2 ON QUERY1.product_serial_num = QUERY2.product_serial_num;

SELECT fap.product_serial_num,fap.product_status,fap.funding_thumb_img_url, fap.product_name, fap.expected_planting_date, fap.farm_square_footage, ROUND(fri.target_total_amount/10000) AS min_amount, DATEDIFF(fri.funding_deadline,NOW()) AS d_day, ROUND(IFNULL(fh.total,0)) AS total_pct FROM user_cart uc JOIN farm_and_product fap USING(product_serial_num) JOIN funding_reg_info fri USING(product_serial_num) left JOIN (SELECT product_serial_num,SUM(user_funding_pct) AS total FROM funding_history GROUP BY product_serial_num) fh USING(product_serial_num) WHERE uc.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} AND fap.product_status IN ('펀딩진행중','경작중','경매대기중') UNION ALL SELECT fap.product_serial_num,fap.product_status,fap.auction_thumb_img_url, fap.product_name, fap.expected_harvest_date,ari.harvest_amount, DATEDIFF(ari.auction_deadline, NOW()) as d_day, psn.max_price AS current_price ,psn.cnt as participants FROM user_cart uc JOIN farm_and_product fap USING(product_serial_num) JOIN auction_reg_info ari USING(product_serial_num) left JOIN (SELECT product_serial_num,MAX(user_price) max_price, COUNT(product_serial_num) cnt FROM auction_history GROUP BY product_serial_num) psn USING(product_serial_num) WHERE uc.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} AND fap.product_status IN ('경매중')

SELECT fap.auction_thumb_img_url, fap.product_name, fap.expected_harvest_date,ari.harvest_amount, DATEDIFF(ari.auction_deadline, NOW()) as d_day, psn.max_price AS current_price ,psn.cnt as participants FROM user_cart uc JOIN farm_and_product fap USING(product_serial_num) JOIN auction_reg_info ari USING(product_serial_num) left JOIN (SELECT product_serial_num,MAX(user_price) max_price, COUNT(product_serial_num) cnt FROM auction_history GROUP BY product_serial_num) psn USING(product_serial_num) WHERE uc.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} AND fap.product_status IN ('경매중')
